articles.description: Lee Isaac Chung’s semi-autobiographical saga about a Korean American family’s life on their Arkansas farm explores the ties that bind and the elusiveness of the American Dream.
articles.content: Minari opens with the Yi family moving from their home in California to a five-acre plot of farmland in rural Arkansas. The gorgeous, verdant lot is empty of crops, with a trailer home sitting squat … [+5574 chars]

articles.title: Khloe Kardashian appears to get early Valentine's Day love from Tristan Thompson - Daily Mail
articles.description: Khloe Kardashian appeared to get some early Valentine's Day love from Tristan Thompson, when she tagged her partner and baby daddy in pre-holiday post on Friday.
articles.content:
Valentine's Day has come early for Khloe Kardashian in more ways than one.
